pages.text: "More like Meka-nical Pipes am I right?"$(p)Mechanical Pipes are used to transport fluids. It can be used to connect to any blocks with Fluid Handlers in them.$(p)Like other transmission pipes, they can be configurated to be Push, Pull, None, or Normal by $(k:sneak) + right clicking on the connected bits with a $(l:item/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l).

$(bold)Redstone Sensitivity$(br)$()By right clicking on a Mechanical Pipe with a $(l:item/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l), you can toggle Redstone Sensitivity on/off. When toggled $(bold)on$(), the Mechanical Pipe will interact with redstone signals. If the Mechanical Pipe is in contact with an active redstone signal, it will disconnect from any surrounding blocks/pipes. It stays this way until the redstone signal is gone. By default, Redstone Sensitivity is toggled off.
